content.webTitle: Andy Murray and Heather Watson set for Court One showdowns

fields.headline: Andy Murray and Heather Watson set for Court One showdowns
fields.bodyText: Britain’s Andy Murray and Heather Watson will be on court on the fifth day of action at Roland Garros. Murray, the seventh seed, faces Australia’s Marinko Matosevic in his second-round match and is scheduled to be third on Court One. Watson, who recorded her ninth victory in succession against Barbora Zahlavova-Strycova in the first round, will then face fourth seed, Simona Halep from Romania, on the same court. Elsewhere Rafa Nadal continues his quest for a record ninth title against Austria’s Dominic Thiem and is second on Court Philippe Chatrier, while the home favourite Gael Monfils faces Jan-Lennard Struff of Germany in the final match on Court Suzanne Lenglen. Order of play on show courts on the fifth day of the French Open on Thursday (all matches second round, prefix numbers denote seedings): Court Philippe Chatrier (play starts at 0900 GMT) 6-Jelena Jankovic (Serbia) v Kurumi Nara (Japan) 1-Rafa Nadal (Spain) v Dominic Thiem (Austria) 12-Richard Gasquet (France) v Carlos Berlocq (Argentina) Elina Svitolina (Ukraine) v 11-Ana Ivanovic (Serbia) Court Suzanne Lenglen (0900 GMT) Simone Bolelli (Italy) v 5-David Ferrer (Spain) Alison Riske (United States) v Kristina Mladenovic (France) 5-Petra Kvitova (Czech Republic) v Marina Erakovic (New Zealand) 23-Gael Monfils (France) v Jan-Lennard Struff (Germany) Court One (0900 GMT) 15-Sloane Stephens (United States) v Polona Hercog (Slovenia) Guillermo Garcia-Lopez (Spain) v Adrian Mannamarino (France) Marinko Matosevic (Australia) v 7-Andy Murray (Britain) Heather Watson (Britain) v 4-Simona Halep (Romania)
